title: Schriftgestaltung.de: Freefont
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015000603im_/http:/typophile.com/files/olivegreen_freefont_420_4189.jpg)

The font [Olivegreen Mono Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015000603/http:/www.schriftgestaltung.de/index.php?inhalt=Schriften&seite=OlivegreenMono) from [Georg Seifert](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015000603/http:/www.reets.de/) is available for free at [MyFonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015000603/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/schriftgestaltung/olive-green-mono).

The rather upright geometric design of the monospace font is contrasted with the very vibrant, playful italic.

Schriftgetaltung.de [german, Typedesign] is a small foundry that published fonts by Georg Seifert and offers a platform for friends to present their own fonts.

- Specimen: [Schriftgestaltung.de/seite/Schriften/OliveGreenMonoSpezimen.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015000603/http:/www.schriftgestaltung.de/seite/Schriften/OliveGreenMonoSpezimen.pdf)
- Purchase: [MyFonts.com/fonts/schriftgestaltung/olive-green-mono](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015000603/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/schriftgestaltung/olive-green-mono)
- Georg Seifert’s Website: [reets.de](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015000603/http:/www.reets.de/)
author: schriftgestalt

comments.content:
The font is cool, Schriftgestaltung font family with 8 styles priced from $26.00. it include Regular, Mono Light, Light Italic, Italic, Medium, Medium Italic and Bold. it is worth.
